DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety titrate oral misoprostol solution intravenous oxytocin labor augmentation woman without adequate uterine contraction .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Titrated Oral Misoprostol Solution Labor Augmentation
DOC.detailed_description: Numerous labor course necessitate augmentation uterine contraction inadequate . When cervix favorable , labor augmentation attempt likely successful . Augmentation woman traditionally undertake intravenous oxytocin amniotomy , either alone combination . In previous trial , proven method titrate oral misoprostol associate low incidence uterine hyperstimulation lower cesarean delivery rate vaginal misoprostol labor induction patient unfavorable cervix . Because administer Misoprostol solution easy cost saving , worth develop novel method labor augmentation .
DOC.criteria: Pregnancy 36 42 week gestation Live singleton Cephalic presentation A reassuring fetal heart rate pattern Bishop score great 6 Inadequate uterine contraction ( less equal 2 per 10 minute ) Nonreassuring fetal heart rate pattern Parity five Uterine scar Suspected placental abruption abnormal fetal heart rate Vaginal bleeding `` bloody show '' Significant maternal cardiac , renal , hepatic disease hypersensitivity oxytocin , misoprostol prostaglandin analogue
